body_html: @asimshankar yes that's what I have in mind as well -- I have made one code change that takes in the keras model to search its own variables instead of searching global variables. (In the end there's no guarantee how many models exist in the graph by the way model_to_estimator works, so asking for global variables does not make sense here)

body: @asimshankar yes that's what I have in mind as well -- I have made one code change that takes in the keras model to search its own variables instead of searching global variables. (In the end there's no guarantee how many models exist in the graph by the way model_to_estimator works, so asking for global variables does not make sense here)
